casebody.data:
No. 10-5073. Christopher Everson, Petitioner v. Brian K. Murphy, Commissioner, Connecticut Department of Correction, et al. 562 U.S. 902, 131 S. Ct. 237,

178 L. Ed. 2d 158,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6209, October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
